Craig Smith sentenced for fatal hit and run of Damon Clark at Brynderwyn waterfall https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/craig-smith-sentenced-for-fatal-hit-and-run-of-damon-clark-at-brynderwyn-waterfall/WBLEYGSKVFHSFIYHL7V2KKC24I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/craig-smith-sentenced-for-fatal-hit-and-run-of-damon-clark-at-brynderwyn-waterfall/WBLEYGSKVFHSFIYHL7V2KKC24I/ Shannon PitmanDamon Clark died while visiting a waterfall. The man who hit him has now been sentenced. Sat, 25 Jan 2025 21:00:00 +0000 Craig Smith was driving along State Highway 1 by Brynderwyn Hills when he fatally struck Damon Clark in September 2022. Composite Photo / NZME
